title: Une Semaine de Vacances = a Week's Vacation
description: A Lyons schoolteacher in her early thirties suffers from severe depression as a result of a crisis of faith in her work and unresolved differences in her relationship whith her lover. On doctor's orders she take a week off during which she visits her parents and has several encounters, notably with the father of one of her pupils. Placed specifically in time - Winter, 1980 - and place - Lyons, its landscape filmed with loving detail - this is a portrait of a woman trying to find sense and direction in her life.  Credits: Director, Bertrand Tavernier ; writers, Bertrand Tavernier, Marie-Francoise Hans, Colo Tavernier ; photography, Pierre William Glenn ; music, Pierre Papadiamandis. Cast: Nathalie Baye, Gerard Lanvin, Michel Galabru, Philippe Noiret.
